law.catch_line: Reserve, Permanent Intermittent Or Call Firefighters As Employees
law.text: In governmental units which accept the provisions of this section, reserve, permanent-intermittent or call firefighters shall be considered employees under this chapter, notwithstanding the definition of “Employee” in section two, and upon retirement shall be considered retirees under this chapter.
